emails.subject: Collaborative Marketing Strategy
emails.body:
Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I would like to discuss a potential collaboration for our marketing campaigns in the upcoming quarter. We have seen great results with our previous efforts and I believe there is room for more impactful initiatives.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Best regards,
Basma Saadi
Marketing Manager, Omantel

emails.subject: Re: Collaborative Marketing Strategy
emails.body:
Dear Basma,

Thank you for reaching out. I agree that our previous campaigns have been successful. I would like to propose focusing on digital channels this time around, as we've seen a shift in consumer behavior towards online engagement.

Best,
Marketing Team
